title: SEIU Local 503 - Oregon State University
content: Stronger Together at OSU Fighting for fair wages, better benefits, and a voice for all classified staff at Oregon State University. About SEIU 503 at OSU. SEIU Local 503 represents thousands of dedicated classified staff at Oregon State University. We are the administrative staff, food service workers, custodians, IT professionals, and many others who keep this university running. Our mission is to build power for workers to ensure fair treatment, secure good contracts, and advocate for a just and equitable workplace.

title: About Us - SEIU Local 503, OSU
content: About Our Union. Learn more about our mission, our history, and our commitment to the classified staff of Oregon State University. Who We Are. SEIU Local 503, Sub-local 083, is the union for classified staff at Oregon State University. We are the thousands of dedicated employees who make this university work.

title: Contact Us - SEIU Local 503, OSU
content: Contact Us. Have a question or need support? We're here to help. Reach out and a union representative will get back to you shortly. Get In Touch. Union Office, General Inquiries, Email Leadership, Email Stewards.

title: Events - SEIU Local 503, OSU
content: Union Events. Stay informed about upcoming meetings, trainings, and solidarity actions. Get involved and make your voice heard! Calendar and Upcoming Events.

title: Leadership - SEIU Local 503, OSU
content: Our Leadership. Our union is led by dedicated, democratically-elected members who volunteer their time to represent our interests. Elected Officers, Appointed Chairs, Union Stewards.

title: News - SEIU Local 503, OSU
content: News & Updates. The latest news on bargaining, workplace rights, and member actions from across the OSU campus. Featured Article, Recent Articles, Older News.

title: Resources & Rights - SEIU Local 503, OSU
content: Resources & Rights. Know your contract, know your rights. Everything you need to be an informed and active member. Know Your Contract, Your Rights at Work, Essential Forms & Documents, Tools for Members.

title: Bylaws - SEIU Local 503, OSU
content: Our Union Bylaws. The governing rules of SEIU Local 503 at Oregon State University, as adopted and amended by the membership. Constitution and Bylaws.

title: Your Union Stewards - SEIU Local 503, OSU
content: Your Union Stewards. Your first line of defense and support in the workplace. What is a Union Steward? What Can a Steward Do For You? How to Contact a Steward.

title: Your Weingarten Rights - SEIU Local 503, OSU
content: Your Weingarten Rights. One of your most important protections as a union worker is the right to have a steward present during questioning. What Are Weingarten Rights? How to Use Your Rights.

title: News: Our COLA Increase Takes Effect This Month! - SEIU Local 503, OSU
content: Our COLA Increase Is Here! A friendly reminder to all of us: the cost-of-living adjustment (COLA) that we won together in our recently ratified contract takes effect this month. You should see this important increase reflected in your upcoming paycheck.

title: News: Ice Cream Social Was a Sweet Success! - SEIU Local 503, OSU
content: Ice Cream Social Was a Sweet Success! Thank you to all the members, family, and friends who joined us for our Solidarity Ice Cream Party outside the Kerr Administration building! It was a fantastic afternoon of sunshine, pizza, sweet treats, and solidarity.

title: Member & Family Bowling Night
content: Join us for a fun night of bowling, food, and community. All members and their families are welcome!

title: Executive Team Meeting
content: Regularly scheduled meeting for the Local 083 Executive Team.

title: Bargaining Committee Meeting
content: The regular monthly strategy meeting for the elected Bargaining Committee.

title: CAT Meeting
content: Contract Action Team meeting to plan and coordinate actions to support bargaining.

title: New Employee Orientation
content: Welcome new members! Learn about your union, your rights, and how to get involved.

title: Steward Meeting
content: A monthly meeting for current stewards to connect, share information, and build skills.

title: Membership Meeting
content: Monthly meeting with updates on bargaining, events, and more. Lunch provided!
